root.name: False

example.code: rect(30, 20, 50, 50) b = False if not b: # If b is False line(20, 10, 90, 80) # This line is drawn else: line(20, 80, 90, 10) # This line is not drawn

root.description: Reserved word representing the logical value "False". Only variables of type Boolean may be assigned the value False.
